00005 """Applies a fix to CR LF TAB handling in xml.dom.
00006 
00007 Fixes this: http://code.google.com/p/chromium/issues/detail?id=76293
00008 Working around this: http://bugs.python.org/issue5752
00009 TODO(bradnelson): Consider dropping this when we drop XP support.
00010 """
00011 
00012 
00013 import xml.dom.minidom
00014 
00015 
00016 def _Replacement_write_data(writer, data, is_attrib=False):
00017   """Writes datachars to writer."""
00018   data = data.replace("&", "&amp;").replace("<", "&lt;")
00019   data = data.replace("\"", "&quot;").replace(">", "&gt;")
00020   if is_attrib:
00021     data = data.replace(
00022         "\r", "&#xD;").replace(
00023         "\n", "&#xA;").replace(
00024         "\t", "&#x9;")
00025   writer.write(data)
00026 
00027 
00028 def _Replacement_writexml(self, writer, indent="", addindent="", newl=""):
00029   # indent = current indentation
00030   # addindent = indentation to add to higher levels
00031   # newl = newline string
00032   writer.write(indent+"<" + self.tagName)
00033 
00034   attrs = self._get_attributes()
00035   a_names = attrs.keys()
00036   a_names.sort()
00037 
00038   for a_name in a_names:
00039     writer.write(" %s=\"" % a_name)
00040     _Replacement_write_data(writer, attrs[a_name].value, is_attrib=True)
00041     writer.write("\"")
00042   if self.childNodes:
00043     writer.write(">%s" % newl)
00044     for node in self.childNodes:
00045       node.writexml(writer, indent + addindent, addindent, newl)
00046     writer.write("%s</%s>%s" % (indent, self.tagName, newl))
00047   else:
00048     writer.write("/>%s" % newl)
00049 
00050 
00051 class XmlFix(object):
00052   """Object to manage temporary patching of xml.dom.minidom."""
00053 
00054   def __init__(self):
00055     # Preserve current xml.dom.minidom functions.
00056     self.write_data = xml.dom.minidom._write_data
00057     self.writexml = xml.dom.minidom.Element.writexml
00058     # Inject replacement versions of a function and a method.
00059     xml.dom.minidom._write_data = _Replacement_write_data
00060     xml.dom.minidom.Element.writexml = _Replacement_writexml
00061 
00062   def Cleanup(self):
00063     if self.write_data:
00064       xml.dom.minidom._write_data = self.write_data
00065       xml.dom.minidom.Element.writexml = self.writexml
00066       self.write_data = None
00067 
00068   def __del__(self):
00069     self.Cleanup()
